name: Egg Drop Soup
ingredients: Chicken Broth, Salt, White Pepper, Eggs, Corn Starch, Green Onions, Sesame Oil
instructions: Simmer chicken broth with salt, white pepper, and sesame oil. Slowly pour in a corn starch slurry while swirling. Slowly pour beaten eggs while swirling. Top with green onions. Optionally serve with crackers

name: Loaded Potato Soup
ingredients: Potatoes, Bacon, Cheese, Onions, Garlic, Green Onions, Flour, Milk, Chicken Broth, Salt, Pepper
instructions: Slice bacon, mince garlic, and dice onions and potatoes. Cook bacon separately. Stir fry onions in oil (or bacon grease) for a few minutes, then add garlic for another minute. Then add flour. Then pour chicken broth and milk in a 3:2 ratio. Season with salt and pepper. When boiling, add potatoes and simmer. Stir in bacon, cheese, and green onions before serving
